forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow this morning will become rain and snow showers for the afternoon hours. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow this morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent this afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with some clearing expected late. Low 28F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and freezing rain early...with rain showers in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and freezing rain in the morning. Rain showers in the afternoon. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Snow showers overnight. Low around 0C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Snow showers overnight. Low 32F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. A shower or two in the afternoon - otherwise, mostly cloudy. High 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. A shower or two in the afternoon - otherwise, mostly cloudy. High near 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Moderating temperatures will change morning scattered snow showers to rain showers by late day. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few snow showers likely changing to rain showers as the day progresses. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 34F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.
